title: Online Course on Mathematical Inquiry for Sustainable Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic operations and data interpretation competencies
context.additional_context: Understanding sustainability concepts through inquiry-based learning and digital tool utilization in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Students can analyze real-world sustainability issues through data collection and graph interpretation
Learners can develop project plans related to Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) using collaboration tools
Participants can create environmental impact assessment reports through mathematical modeling (e.g., carbon footprint calculation)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
